MS MCQs

    Apply AI Builder Text Recognition in the transportation industry

    »

    1. What are the capabilities of AI Builder Text Recognition?

      Recognize printed characters on a picture

      Recognize printed and handwritten characters on a picture

      Recognize symbols, printed and handwritten characters on a picture


    2. Which Azure service is powering this technology?

      Azure Entity Recognition

      Azure Image Analysis

      Azure OCR


    3. How can you retrieve the text recognized in Power Apps Canvas?

      extRecognizerX.SelectedText

      TextRecognizerX.OcrObjects

      Both of the above


    4. How can Text Recognizer component get the image to be analyzed in Power Apps Canvas?

      From OneDrive

      Taking a picture or uploading from a local disk

      From Microsoft Dataverse


    5. Is AI Builder Text Recognizer component available from a model driven Power App?

      Yes

      No
